thread.title: Duke of Edinburgh to undergo hip surgery at private London hospital

title: Duke of Edinburgh to undergo hip surgery at private London hospital
text:
Duke of Edinburgh to undergo hip surgery at private London hospital 12:31pm BST - 00:38 
Britain's Prince Philip, the 96-year-old husband of Queen Elizabeth, is due to have hip surgery on Wednesday at a private hospital in London. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Britain's Prince Philip, the 96-year-old husband of Queen Elizabeth, is due to have hip surgery on Wednesday at a private hospital in London. Rough cut (no reporter narration).
